Body: Description: Greetings. I've been having this issue where I enable a CAP policy, but (for example) I need to send a mail and said mailo won't be sent because of the CAP policy. I've tried to configure an allowlist for this to be solved but I haven't been able to, so I would appreciate some help in this regard.
What We've Learned Updated: We have sent the customer our documentation for the email domain allowlist and asked if they need further assistance.
Next Steps Updated: We are waiting for the customer's answer.
Invitation updated. Attendees: No attendees listed

02.05
We found in the collected logs that an email address was not included in the E-mail Domain Allowlist, and that caused the e-mail to be blocked by EPP.

Next Steps Updated: We are waiting for the customer's answer.

Waiting for the collected log files.

02.05
Waiting for the customer to confirm this solves the reported issue.
